name: Aimless First Game
description:
A simple platformer. Which includes both 2d and 3d. The game itself is based on two demos of the Godot engine. It's the first attempt to program a game and served more to understand the engine.

Only one Linux version was released because I'm a big fan of Linux and open source software and I want to support these things.

The graphics, textures and models used for this game can be used by any buyer for their own projects. Regardless of whether they are freely accessible or commercial.
